title: Kids for Character-1996 (Eng-Spa) - Choices Count-1997 (Eng)
description:
All the Videos are recorded from VHS tapes. Resolution is Full-Screen 720 x 480.

Kids for Character (1996) 
Video Family  -  23 April 1996 (USA) 

Details
 
Country: USA 
Language: English | Spanish 
Release Date: 23 April 1996 (USA)
Run Time: 60 Minutes
 

Winner of the Parents' Choice Gold Award, uses fun-filled skits and songs to teach kids the "Six Pillars of Character", trustworthiness, respect, responsibility, fairness, caring and citizenship.

Learning right from wrong has never been so much fun! Nearly 1,000 kids and 30 all-time favorite leading children's characters join in fun-filled skits and songs that teach the "Six Pillars of Character". Children will love the segments by Babar, Barney, Gullah Gullah Island, Lamb Chop's Play-Along, The Magic School Bus, and The Puzzle Place, that lead to a spectacular musical finale, including Cat in the Hat, Madeline, Spot, Thomas the Tank Engine, and many more. 

----------------------------

"Kids for Character: Choices Count" is the 1997 sequel to "Kids for Character". 
Studio: Fox Home Entertainment

It is about using the six pillars of character for making choices.

Details
 
Country: USA 
Language: English  
Release Date: 14 October 1997 (USA)
Run Time: 60 Minutes
